caption: Relating to the purchase of or acquisition of title to real property by certain foreign entities.
summary: This bill prohibits entities from designated countries that pose national security risks (as identified by US Intelligence) from purchasing real property in Texas. This affects Chinese entities if China is listed in the three most recent Annual Threat Assessments. The ban applies to government entities, organizations headquartered in or controlled by designated countries. The Attorney General can enforce through court action and appoint receivers to manage/sell violating properties.
translation: 该法案禁止来自被美国情报机构认定为对国家安全构成风险的指定国家的实体购买德克萨斯州的不动产。如果中国在最近三次年度威胁评估中被列入，这将影响中国实体。该禁令适用于政府实体、总部设在指定国家或受指定国家控制的组织。司法部长可以通过法院诉讼执行，并任命接管人管理/出售违规财产。
committees:
1. House Committee on State Affairs
2. House Committee on International Relations Economic Development
